column1: Smoque BBQ////The flavor of the ribs could stand on its own
column2: even without sauce. The texture isn't chewy and falls off the bone with one meek chomp. And now
column3: the sauce... married with the ribs
column4: it's pure perfection. The sauce has just the right amount of spice and the right amount of tang. It would be a sin to let a drop go to waste
column5: and honestly it could probably stand on it's own in a glass with a silly straw.
